definition: variant of 裝屄|装屄[zhuang1 bi1]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]

sentences.english: This is China Harmonious number train making force signal failure causes.
sentences.chinese: 這就是中國動車裝逼信號失靈的原因。
